column4: Mexican engineers flood Tesla hiring event in Monterrey
column5: MONTERREY  Mexico Engineers from across Mexico streamed into a cramped hotel lobby in the industrial city of Monterrey for a chance of a job with the U.S. electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc   which is looking south of the border for talent in short supply at home.

column4: Mexican engineers flood Tesla hiring event in Monterrey
column5: MONTERREY  Mexico  May 6 Engineers from across Mexico streamed into a cramped hotel lobby in the industrial city of Monterrey for a chance of a job with the U.S. electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc  which is looking south of the border for talent in short supply at home.
